68d421ab6b28b66e20a9e902 description:
Colored secrets nest where locks have reputations and glass pretends to be brave.
I want the five bright eggs people brag about and a handful of gold to prove you listened.
Find them without turning the city into a tour guide and bring them home breathing.
68d421ab6b28b66e20a9e902 startedMessageT:
The city hid answers in painted shells.
Find the colors where keys matter and glass talks too loud.
Bring a little gold so I know you paid attention.
68d421ab6b28b66e20a9e902 successMessageT:
Pink, purple, yellow, green, blue, and a shine that buys silence.
You searched with your feet, not your mouth.
68d421ab6b28b66e20a9e902 acceptPlayerMes:
Pick the five colors from the usual boasts.
Gather gold along the way.
Hand everything to me and keep the path quiet.
68d421ab6b28b66e20a9e902 completePlayerM:
You did not just loot. You understood.
These will fund the next question.
